ROW.DATDSC: select id,name,note,typ from sysmw where syt='[%selsytid]' and id='[%selgrdid]'
select grdid||'-'||GRDROW||'-'||GRDCOL 位置编号,id1 标准1名称,name1 标准1说明,id2 标准2名称,name2 标准2说明 from SYTXMLCELLDEF where sytid='[%syt]' and grdid='[%mwid]'
select grdid||'-'||GRDCOL 位置编号,id1 标准1名称,name1 标准1说明,id2 标准2名称,name2 标准2说明 from SYTXMLCOLDEF where sytid='[%syt]' and grdid='[%mwid]'
select distinct CLS id,cls name from LAYHDR where deforg='[%thisdeforg]'
select logoimg img, id||'-'||name||'~'||note name, id, NVL(title,name) title, deforg , logoimg,guid from layhdr where deforg='[%thisdeforg]' and cls='[%clsid]' order by id
